name: Rapunzel - Book - Cards Match - Jigsaw Puzzle (Lite)
name_original: Rapunzel - Book - Cards Match - Jigsaw Puzzle (Lite)
description:
This version includes a demo of the book and 2 games that your kids will love: Memory Match & Jigsaw puzzle.
If you like the book, it can be purchased within the app.

Rapunzel is an amazing storybook multilingual, illustrated by Edith López Salazar (Edetsu F.), with text and narrations that your kids will love.

Features:

1) Automatic navigation and narration make it very simple to use.
2) Simple story for the little ones, easy to read.
3) 8 different languages supported: English, Spanish, Portuguese, Chinese, Russian, Italian, German, and French.
4) Narrated by a native speaker on each language.
5) Illustrated characters especially for your little ones.
6) A fun and challenging Memory Match game to increase your children's brain activity.
7) A Jigsaw puzzle game to have even more fun.

Did I mention about the amazing images?

Enjoy.
